content: marian by jane richmond finished measurements approximately 9in/23cm tall with a 32in/81cm circumference abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit p purl st s stitch es directions co 45 sts optional twist before joining rotate the first stitch one full turn around the needle this will create a twist in your work for a video tutorial on this technique visit janerichmond blogspot com/p/tutorials html materials join work and begin seed stitch as follows 1 x 200g skein of twinkle handknits soft k1 p1 to end of round k1 chunky shown in french grey 83yds/76m 19 us/15mm circular needle 24in next and every following round yarn needle knit the purl sts and purl the knit sts gauge continue until work measures 8 5in/22cm 6 sts and 12 row = 4in/10cm in seed stitch bobble in seed st *please note that this pattern uses exactly weave in ends one skein of the recommended yarn this does not include yarn used to make a swatch janerichmond com © jane richmond 2008 pattern support janerichmonddesigns@gmail com -patterns are for personal use only-
